column1: Who's on first and What's on second while I Don't Know's on third? Time 4 W.H.O. 2 stop lauding, trusting Chinese "efforts" & reveal their ineptitude early & often? W.H.O. Declares Global Emergency as Wuhan Coronavirus Spreads
